subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brandon Roy led the Trail Blazers to one of the greatest comebacks in N.B.A. playoff history, while the Grizzlies beat San Antonio in their first playoff victory on their home court.
snippet: Brandon Roy led the Trail Blazers to one of the greatest comebacks in N.B.A. playoff history, while the Grizzlies beat San Antonio in their first playoff victory on their home court.
